name: Choco Bliss
description: Rich chocolate cookies with a gooey center.
detailedDescription: Indulge in the decadent taste of Choco Bliss, featuring a rich chocolate dough and a gooey, melt-in-your-mouth center.
ingredients: Cocoa, butter, flour, sugar, chocolate chips

name: Vanilla Dream
description: Classic vanilla cookies with a buttery texture.
detailedDescription: Vanilla Dream brings the classic flavor of vanilla to life, with a buttery texture that crumbles perfectly in every bite.

name: Berry Delight
description: Soft cookies infused with mixed berry flavors.
detailedDescription: Berry Delight combines the sweetness of mixed berries with a soft, chewy cookie base, perfect for a fruity snack.

name: Nutty Crunch
description: Crunchy cookies packed with roasted nuts.
detailedDescription: Nutty Crunch offers a satisfying bite with a mix of roasted nuts baked into every cookie for a delightful crunch.

name: Citrus Zest
description: Refreshing lemon cookies with a tangy glaze.
detailedDescription: Citrus Zest delivers a refreshing burst of lemon flavor, topped with a tangy citrus glaze for an extra zing.
ingredients: Lemon zest, lemon juice, butter, flour, sugar

name: Peanut Butter Bliss
description: Creamy peanut butter cookies for nut lovers.
detailedDescription: Peanut Butter Bliss is the perfect treat for peanut butter enthusiasts, with a creamy, nutty flavor baked into every cookie.

name: Mint Choco Crunch
detailedDescription: Mint Choco Crunch combines the refreshing taste of mint with chunks of rich chocolate, creating a unique flavor combo.
ingredients: Mint extract, cocoa, butter, flour, sugar, chocolate chunks

name: Caramel Swirl
description: Cookies with caramel swirls and a soft texture.
detailedDescription: Caramel Swirl features rich caramel baked into soft cookies for a delightful, sweet experience.
ingredients: Caramel, butter, flour, sugar, vanilla extract

name: Oatmeal Raisin Classic
description: Classic oatmeal cookies with sweet raisins.
detailedDescription: Oatmeal Raisin Classic combines the wholesome taste of oats with the natural sweetness of raisins, perfect for a healthy snack.
ingredients: Oats, raisins, butter, flour, sugar, cinnamon

name: Coconut Paradise
description: Tropical coconut cookies with a crispy texture.
detailedDescription: Coconut Paradise takes you to the tropics with its light, crispy texture and rich coconut flavor.

name: Triple Choco Overload
description: Loaded with three types of chocolate.
detailedDescription: Triple Choco Overload is packed with milk, dark, and white chocolate for the ultimate chocolate loverâ€™s dream.
ingredients: Milk chocolate, dark chocolate, white chocolate, butter, flour, sugar

name: Salted Caramel Crunch
description: A mix of sweet caramel and a hint of salt.
detailedDescription: Salted Caramel Crunch combines sweet caramel flavor with a pinch of salt for a sophisticated, balanced treat.
ingredients: Caramel, sea salt, butter, flour, sugar

name: Espresso Delight
detailedDescription: Espresso Delight infuses the bold flavor of espresso into a buttery cookie, perfect for coffee lovers.

name: Cinnamon Sugar Magic
description: Soft cookies dusted with cinnamon and sugar.
detailedDescription: Cinnamon Sugar Magic is a nostalgic treat, combining soft cookies with a sweet cinnamon sugar coating.

name: White Choco Raspberry
description: A mix of sweet white chocolate and tart raspberries.
detailedDescription: White Choco Raspberry is a delightful mix of sweet white chocolate and tart raspberry flavors in a soft, chewy cookie.
ingredients: White chocolate, raspberries, butter, flour, sugar
